CustomField.description: Formula = TEXT(QS_Product__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionPricing__c). If this field is populated, the system treats the product as recurring. If blank, the system treats the product as an asset (non-recurring product).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula = TEXT(QS_Product__r.SBQQ__SubscriptionPricing__c). If this field is populated, the system treats the product as recurring. If blank, the system treats the product as an asset (non-recurring product).
CustomField.label: Product Subscription Pricing
